needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: As I was learning about the challenges of working in startups, I realized that most people underestimate the importance of doing great work to actually be happy, not just happy with their work. This realization led me to change my approach to what I want to do in my life and work. I wanted to discover the most general truths, not just the most fashionable or trendy ones. I took a detour from traditional philosophy and logic, studying art, and discovered a more general interest in understanding and appreciating the beauty of still life. I also discovered that the most beautiful still life paintings often feature unusual techniques and perspectives, and that the people behind the paintings are often overlooked. By using Lisp, I found a language that allowed me to think about the problems and solutions of a startup in a way that was not constrained by the conventions of traditional software development. I shared my discovery with others and found that it resonated with many people.
